name: Locked On (grill, Mr_roadkill22)
description:
(please click the fullscreen button in the bottom right corner!)

shoot your heart out! don't actually, that's a little too graphic.

an endless point and click shooter where you can blow up to 50 characters heads off! including but not limited to:

 •  a monkey!

•  a woman and her baby!

•  bob ross!

•  slenderman! 

•  a cane dancing skeleton!

•  many old people!

•  satan himself!

(made in 2 weeks for the my first gamejam winter 2021 gamejam)
